markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[First World Adept](/Feats.aspx?ID=35) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Gnome" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=80" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 45 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
at least one primal innate spell

</column>

---

Over time your fey magic has grown stronger. You gain [_faerie fire_](/Spells.aspx?ID=107) and [_invisibility_](/Spells.aspx?ID=164) as 2nd-level primal innate spells. You can cast each of these primal innate spells once per day.
name: First World Adept
prerequisite: at least one primal innate spell
prerequisite_markdown: at least one primal innate spell

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 9" pfs="Standard" > First World Adept Source Core Rulebook pg. 45 4.0 Prerequisites at least one primal innate spell --- Over time your fey magic has grown stronger. You gain faerie fire and invisibility as 2nd-level primal innate spells. You can cast each of these primal innate spells once per day.
